players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Day 1 begins.

players.name: Bob
memory: You're Bob, the villager.
Night 1 begins.
Alice was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
Charlie: "I investigated Diana last night and discovered she is the mafioso. We should vote for her to protect the town!"
You: "I think Charlie's claim is worth considering. We should vote for Diana to be safe."
Diana: "I don't believe you, Charlie. If you're really the detective, why accuse me so quickly without more evidence? Maybe you're the mafia trying to frame me!"
You: "I still think Charlie's claim makes sense. We should vote for Diana to protect ourselves."
Diana: "Charlie, you're desperate to pin this on me, but I think you're the real mafia trying to mislead everyone. Let's vote for you instead!"
Charlie: "Diana, your accusations against me are just a mafioso's deflection. I investigated you and confirmed you're the mafia. We must vote you out to protect the town!"
Votes: Bob voted for Diana, Charlie voted for Diana, Diana voted for Charlie
Diana was arrested
